DataElement.preferredName: CoPaQ Caregiver or Companion Incurred Other Expenses Yes No Does Not Know Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Yes/No/I do not know indicator about whether patient's caregiver incurred other expenses.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cost for Patients Questionnaire Caregiver or Companion Incurred Other Expenses
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to assess an individual's expenses as a result of their state of health. It includes questions about out-of-pocket costs, time required for travel or for booking medical services, and loss of income.:A question about whether an individual's companion incurred any other expenses.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
